attributes.action: Let the Secretary of State have the final say on childhood vaccinations and not the Joint Commitee on Vaccination and Immunisation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We as parents do not accept the authority of the JCVI to decide what vaccinations our children will have but will make this choice ourselves based on informed consent.
We are concerned that the Government is using this as a way to make vaccinations mandatory by the back door.
Members of the JCVI have both direct and indirct links to the vaccine industry and should not be given these powers as they are not answerable to anyone unlike politicians.
